name: CTRL-Z
description:
Download the Zip file. Unzip, open the CTRL-Z folder and launch the CTRL-Z UE4 Application.

The aim of the game is to type the words that appear on screen then hit 'Enter' to kill the zombies. Should you see a red health potion appear hit 'Tab' to use it and replenish health. The boss fight is a little different and I'll leave it for you to figure out. This is a student project and there are some bugs you may encounter - We're always happy to hear feedback so feel free to tell us about all the times the game didn't work for you!
